rows.label: qev065202_MSG0003
rows.name:
Mmm? You want to know the access code?
Well, I'll give it to you under one condition...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0004
rows.name:
Kill that traitor and return me to my daughters!
Do this and I will tell you all you wish to know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_JNK0010
rows.name: Threaten

rows.label: qev065202_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Fortun that she'll be the one
who dies unless she talks.

rows.label: qev065202_JNK0020
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev065202_SEL0021
rows.name: Pay no mind to Fortun's obvious taunts.

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0005
rows.name:
If you wish to kill me, then cease blabbing and do it.
My daughters already carry my will within them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0006
rows.name:
I may cease to exist as an entity, but my ambitions
will remain. I will be the victor in the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0007
rows.name:
Ignore Mother's words. She's only trying to take control
of the conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0008
rows.name: So be it. In time you will die alongside that traitor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have all your data, [ST:playername ].
There is no hiding place that can keep you safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ignore Mother's words. Once she no longer has my
sisters to command, she'll be powerless to act on any
threats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0011
rows.name: More importantly, I've figured out the encryption system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0012
rows.name: Her pompous AI itself is what's protecting that data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0013
rows.name:
So if we can find a way to erase her personality,
we'll have our access code.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0014
rows.name:
Fiend! Would you really kill your own mother?
Could you weak-willed Definians survive my loss?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0015
rows.name: I'm not afraid to find out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0016
rows.name:
Ha! Empty bravado. You Definians NEED me!
...But enough talk. If you're capable of ending me,
then do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0017
rows.name:
Rrrgh... Hey, [ST:playername ]?
What do you think I should do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0018
rows.name: Should we kill her, or look for some other way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest Killing

rows.label: qev065202_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Erio to end Fortun.

rows.label: qev065202_JNK0040
rows.name: Suggest Mercy

rows.label: qev065202_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Erio to find another way.

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0019
rows.name: I see... N-no, you're right. I'll do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0020
rows.name:
My my my. This certainly IS a surprise!
I never thought one of my daughters would dare
buck my control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0021
rows.name:
Was it contact with humans that brought this about?
Is this the power the Ganglion so fear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0022
rows.name:
Well then, I suppose any further struggle is futile.
End my life with your own hands, my daughter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0023
rows.name:
This may be a strange thing to say, Mother, but...
Thank you for all you've done for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0066
rows.name: Ah...AAAAAAaaaaah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0024
rows.name: ...I have the code. And Mother is gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now if we can just take down the three sisters passing
on Mother's will to the others, the organization driving
them all to crime will crumble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0026
rows.name: Their base is in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0027
rows.name:
Oh, and I know their combat abilities are far beyond
my own, so be ready for a tough fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0028
rows.name: But what? I don't know how to get past her encryption.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0029
rows.name:
It would take a scientist with almost supernatural
knowledge. Are we really going to find someone like
that here in New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0030
rows.name: Ha ha! I knew Erio couldn't do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0031
rows.name:
The Definians are mine, now and forevermore!
In time, my daughters will also end your sad existence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0032
rows.name: As if you primitives could alter my noble system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0033
rows.name:
Be advised that I will kill the lot of you in time...
Including that animal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0034
rows.name:
Hmph! Emeroa and her sisters are incapable of losing
to your ilk. Enjoy walking into the open arms of death![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0035
rows.name: Wh-what? Emeroa is...dead? Then my subjects are...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0036
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0037
rows.name:
Hmm. Now that I take a closer look, you have a noble
air about you, [ST:playername ]. I confess
that I have secretly admired you for some time now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065202_MSG0038
rows.name:
I would like nothing more than to be of service to
someone of your regal stature. If there is any way at
all I can be of assistance, please do let me know![ST:wait ]
